Name: Think flexible
Question: I can easily project myself in various concepts, various modes of thought and/or understand and/or provide methodologies.
Description: I can easily project myself in various concepts, various modes of thought and/or understand and/or provide methodologies.

Name: Innovative
Question: I think up solutions that are renewing.
Description: I think up solutions that are renewing.

Name: Original
Question: I think up solutions that are less likely.
Description: I think up solutions that are less likely.

Name: Can switch fast
Question: I can quickly switch from one field of thought to the other.
Description: I can quickly switch from one field of thought to the other

Name: Think up alternatives
Question: Mostly, I think up several applicable and feasible solutions or ideas during an assignment.
Description: Mostly, I think up several applicable and feasible solutions or ideas during an assignment.

Name: Think up concept
Question: I can independently think up an achievable and feasible idea or solution by means of a briefing from scratch within time and budget.
Description: I can independently think up an achievable and feasible idea or solution by means of a briefing – from scratch – within time and budget.

Name: Make concept concrete
Question: If a concept or solution has been chosen, I can think up creative and practical and achievable solutions and/or ideas within this framework.
Description: If a concept or solution once has been chosen, I can think up creative and practical and achievable solutions and/or ideas within this framework.
